sentence.text: Of the 465,447 CpG sites analyzed, 12 showed differential methylation (false discovery rate AAAA0.15), including markers within genes associated with monogenic diabetes (regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II) or obesity (positive regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II).

entity.text: regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II
positive regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II
